text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, there you are! Heeey!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
So, you're one of the trainers who<n>came up to me after
tryouts, right?<n>Right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Follow me, I'm gonna test you!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Well you see, after you left, Prez told<n>me to "Consider each
trainer carefully,<n>then choose one in whom you can<n>place
your trust."

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
So I thought, what better way than to<n>have a trial training
session? So today,<n>I'll be testing you! ♪ Show me your<n>
best training skills.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...Well, guess I'm Teio's trainer for<n>the day.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, a hopping exercise? So I'm<n>supposed to navigate this
mini hurdle<n>course on just one foot...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Sounds kinda fun! What's the time to<n>beat?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I show her the goal I'd set, whichwas supposed to be on thedifficult side.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whaaat, that's it? Easy-peasy! Be<n>back in a flash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As promised, she's back seemingly<n>no sooner than she
had dashed off,<n>well before the target time.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Phew... Sooo, is that it? I can run lots<n>more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I give her a few more exercises to try,<n>and she shatters
expectations on<n>each one.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: All done! So? Set some pretty nice<n>records there, didn't I?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Right? Hehe. C'mon, let the invincible<n>Teio know just how
incredible she is!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Mhm. I've never lost to anyone, you<n>see. I win every single
race, and<n>everyone showers me with praise!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Which feels amazing, by theway. ♪ All the compliments show thatpeople really do think the world of me.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Like at my very first race, after I took<n>first, everyone came
up to me and<n>was like "You were incredible!"

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Honestly, I just couldn't get enough<n>of it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
And once I'm in the Twinkle Series,<n>more and more people
will get to see<n>how amazing I am, right?
choice_data_list: And that's why you enrolled here.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ding ding ding ding! That's right! ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, I can't wait! I wanna get in a G1<n>race already! I wanna
hear from<n>everyone that I'm the most<n>amazingest racer
ever!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her every word brimming with<n>excited anticipation, Teio
never once<n>seems to consider the possibility that<n>she
might lose.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But to be honest, after seeing her run,<n>I'm having a hard
time imagining her<n>ever losing too.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, we were still doing your test.<n>So, is this all you got
for today?<n>Cooldown time already?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: There is one last thing that'll helpme really see her true potential.
choice_data_list:
Why don't we wrap up by measuring your
2500-meter time?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
The 2500-meter? I'm good at that! Oh<n>I get it, you wanna
see me at my best,<n>don't you?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay then! Here I go! ♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... How'd I do?
choice_data_list: Two minutes and thirty-four seconds... That's fast!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoa, a new personal best! Let's go!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
2500 meters... Among the G1 races,<n>that would be equal to
the length of<n>the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa! Prez?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What are you doing here? Have you<n>come to see me?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: More or less.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My apologies for interrupting your<n>regimen, Trainer, but
might you<n>measure my time as well?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: The same distance as Teio—2500<n>meters.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you're gonna run one too?<n>Woohoo! You don't mind,
do you,<n>Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'll be off, then.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Phew... Trainer, my time?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez... That's two whole seconds<n>faster than me...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Indeed. I've bested you, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yep, I lose! You really are incredible!<n>The very best racer
ever!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Is there nothing else you wish to<n>say?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Like what?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well... Allow me to drive the point<n>home. Teio, you have just
lost to me.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Uhh... I mean, yeah... That's<n>why I was saying how
amazing you<n>are... Huh?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Right... Sorry for the interruption.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Teio, you're done with training, yes?<n>How about you go for
a cooldown jog<n>and enjoy the fresh air?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Uh, okay! Will do! Later, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now then... I have a question for you,<n>Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: What do you make of Teio's reaction<n>just now?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's a little hard to think in Rudolf's<n>imposing presence, but
let's see...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Teio shows impressive talent and<n>ambition, but because
she puts her<n>role model on such a high pedestal,<n>losing
didn't faze her in the slightest.
choice_data_list: I think she could be wasting her potential.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
...Wasting her potential, you say? The<n>school was right to
hire you as a<n>trainer, with that perceptive eye of<n>yours.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I agree... Teio's current mindset is<n>only holding her back.
Truly regretful<n>to see in one with such lofty<n>ambitions.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm... You know what? I'd like to ask<n>a favor of you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You see, I plan to have a race with<n>Teio soon...
